scenario: Bob paid the following interest amounts: Car Loan Interest (Personal): $2,269.90, Mortgage Interest on Main Home: $3,630.60, Student Loan Interest (assume deductible): $2,766.31.
question: Calculate the total deductible interest under I.R.C. § 163.
answer_explanation: Personal interest is generally not deductible. Total: $6,396.91.
